short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learning Notes Plus makes it easy to use Notion cloud notebooks to write notes for your udemy classes.
short.zh_TW: udemy 線上課程的 notion 筆記小幫手

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learning Notes Plus allows users to use the powerful Notion cloud-based notes feature to write  notes for udemy online courses

There are two benefit 

1 Users don't need to worry about how the lecture/video notes are organized in Notion

2 Users don't have to worry about finding notes for a course or video, as long as they remember where the course or video is, Learning Notes Plus will automatically prompt the user where the notes are
long.zh_TW:
Learning Notes Plus. 讓你使用強大的 Notion 雲端筆記來紀錄線上課的影片筆記變得更簡單！

這有兩個好處 

1 使用者不需要煩惱如何在 Notion 中組織講座/影片筆記的位置，Learning Notes Plus 會自動根據課程大綱/播放清單幫你建立筆記資料庫

2 使用者不必擔心找不到課程或影片的筆記連結，只要記得課程或影片的位置，Learning Notes Plus會自動提示使用者筆記的位置。
